Duria Fruit.Description: Removes the burn immediately when getting burned.

Fik Fruit.Description: Removes the poison immediately when getting poisoned.

Cuco Fruit.Description: Removes the shock immediately when getting shocked.

Gao Fruit.Description: Wakes up immediately when falling asleep.

Sur Fruit.Description: Increases Skill Power when using an Electric attack.

Pomo Fruit.Description: Increases Skill Power when using a Normal attack.

Mull Fruit.Description: Restores to 75% SP when nearing exhaustion.

Juba Fruit.Description: Restores to 50% HP when in danger.

Canul Fruit.Description: Restores to 70% HP when in danger, at the risk of getting a status ailment.

Oki Fruit.Description: Increases the Attack of the Coromon when in danger.

Dally Fruit.Description: Increases the Sp. Attack of the Coromon when in danger.

Dip Fruit.Description: Increases the Defense of the Coromon when in danger.
